sentences.en: Are you in direct contact with the Pentagon or are you talking to some liaison?
sentences.cn: 你能直接或者通过联络员跟国防部联系上 吗 ?

sentences.en: At first the plan was for professional diplomats of middle rank to head the liaison offices.
sentences.cn: 原先的设想是,联络处主任由中级职业外交官担任.

sentences.en: He had already contracted a liaison with some girl.
He wondered if there had been liaison between the two groups.
sentences.cn: 他纳闷这两个组织是否有过什么联系.

sentences.en: I have a professor on my staff here as liaison with our higher education institutions.
sentences.cn: 我的员工中有一名教授充当我们和高等教育机构的联络人。

sentences.en: It's important that we work in close liaison with other charities in this field.
sentences.cn: 在这一领域与其他慈善团体在工作中保持紧密联络非常重要.

sentences.en: Liaison between police forces and the art world is vital to combat art crime.
sentences.cn: 警方和艺术界的联手对于打击艺术品犯罪至关重要。

sentences.en: My task boils down to industrial liaison and trouble shooting.
sentences.cn: 我的职务统而言之就是,在工业方面负责连络并排难解纷.

sentences.en: Our role is to ensure liaison between schools and parents.
sentences.cn: 我们的作用是确保学校与家长间的联系。

sentences.en: Please send us a technical liaison letter about it.
sentences.cn: 请给我们一份有关此事的技术联络单.

sentences.en: She acts as a liaison between patients and staff.
sentences.cn: 她在病人与医护人员间充当沟通的桥梁。

sentences.en: She is responsible for liaison with researchers at other universities.
sentences.cn: 她负责与其他大学的研究人员联系.
索伦森被委派为联络官.

sentences.en: The liaison with scientists working on the same or allied problems will be facilitated.
sentences.cn: 同从事相同或类似课题研究的科学家们的合作会更加方便.

sentences.en: The negotiator acted as liaison between labour and management.
sentences.cn: 谈判者充当劳资双方的联络人.

trans.tran_cn: 联络，联络人，[语]连音，（尤指一方或双方已婚的）私通，[烹]加浓料
trans.tran_en: the regular exchange of information between groups of people, especially at work, so that each group knows what the other is doing
